txt.en: 'It's good to know that not every new visitor in the town is aligned with the enemy. Still, there is more work to be done. Let us return.'

You have been asked to help identify infiltrators in the town of Herne. You are to ask for details on joining Sharkey's ranks and determine how many in the town might be aligned with the enemy out of the south.
You spoke with a suspicious looking villager
Find your way to the scout
